us.additionalInfo: MLB.TV offers out-of-market games. Local games are typically available on regional sports networks.

ca.cost: CAD 129.99/year for MLB.TV, varies for Sportsnet packages
ca.restrictions: Local blackouts may apply for MLB.TV
ca.additionalInfo: Sportsnet holds rights to Toronto Blue Jays games and other select MLB games.

gb.cost: £79.99/year for MLB.TV, varies for BT Sport packages
gb.additionalInfo: BT Sport broadcasts select MLB games in the UK.

au.cost: AUD 139.99/year for MLB.TV, AUD 25/month for Kayo Sports
au.additionalInfo: Kayo Sports offers select MLB games in Australia.

jp.additionalInfo: DAZN holds rights to MLB games in Japan.

kr.additionalInfo: SPOTV broadcasts select MLB games in South Korea.

mx.cost: Varies for MLB.TV and ESPN packages
mx.additionalInfo: ESPN broadcasts select MLB games in Mexico.

latam.cost: Varies by country for MLB.TV and ESPN packages
latam.additionalInfo: ESPN holds rights to MLB games in many Latin American countries.

eu.additionalInfo: MLB.TV is the primary way to watch MLB games in most European countries.

in.additionalInfo: SonyLIV holds rights to broadcast MLB games in India.

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport broadcasts select MLB games in South Africa and other African countries.

cn.additionalInfo: Tencent holds streaming rights for MLB games in China.
